name: self_care
desc: Look after you! Treat yourself to good food, retail therapy, or whatever makes you happy

name: socialize
desc: Even if you're annoyed, good friends don't let that last long. Go have some fun

name: movie
desc: It's amazing how a good movie can distract the mind and relax the body

name: meditate
desc: Meditate for 30 minutes to clear your mind

name: exercise
desc: Blow off some steam! Exercise is one of the healthiest ways to do that

name: comedy
desc: Binging comedy on any streaming platform is a great move. It's hard to be annoyed while you're laughing

name: change
desc: Go get a change of scenery for 5 minutes

name: write
desc: Write down all the things that are upsetting you on a piece of paper, then rip it up

name: game
desc: Go play any kind of game with your friends
